projects.title: Wolfenstein 3D
projects.description: Recreation of Wolfenstein 3D in browser written in TypeScript with custom 3D engine. Complete with first level and most of the mechanics from the original game.

projects.title: Castle Royale
projects.description: Logical 1v1 multiplayer game written in a team of two. The goal is to get the characters to the right places.

projects.title: Dr Mario
projects.description: Recreation of Dr Mario game written in JavaScript. Complete with a singleplayer mode with all mechanics is available.

projects.title: Ludo
projects.description: Design of a Ludo game based on server-client interaction. The Ajax Long Polling technique is used here.

projects.title: Threejs Shooter
projects.description: 3D shooter game, allowing you to create your own level and then attempt to finish it. Scoreboard of highest scores is available.
